name: Troika! Tarot Jam Backgrounds by Tredain
name_original: Troika! Tarot Jam Backgrounds by Tredain
description:
Troika! Backgrounds for Axes & Orcs Tarot Background Jam. An assortment of fun sci fi fantasy types that came to mind. Originally intended to be 5, I added a 6th (SURPRISE!) background since someone had already done an office worker type.

Troika! Tarot Jam Backgrounds by Tredain is an independent production by Tredain and is not affiliated with the Melsonian Arts Council.
